name: WIN THE GAME: WTF!
description:
WIN THE GAME: WTF! - is a hardcore puzzle game. Try to finish the game without spending your nerves.
Your goal, to throw the ball to the finish and go to the next level but at the levels you may die The main thing is to be so fast!

Features:

  • Simple controls
  • Pleasant music.
  • Over 25+ levels.
  • Hardcore gameplay.
  • More than 2 hours of gameplay
